classroom: ^Ken: My sister said there was a new girl in her class today. Apparently she’s fresh from Earth.
^Ian: That’s weird. We don’t normally get new colonists until the big ships come.
^Ken: We should ask her to join our GalaxyDrift sessions. Now that Theo is gone we need another player.
^Ian: So then is Theo officially gone then?
^Ken: I don’t know. Maybe he got sick again and had to go back. Last time it was pretty urgent.
^Ian: He could have at least sent a message to say goodbye.
^Ken: You know how his Mom is.
^(Isa and Layla talk about party gifts)
^Layla: Have you figured out what you’re doing for Sasha’s birthday gift yet?
^Isa: It’s so hard to get her stuff because she already has everything. I’ll probably draw one of her favorite anime characters. You?
^Layla: The new girl said she would get me baking powder so I can make her a cake.
^Isa: Are you trying to poison her?
^Layla: Hey, I’m good at baking. It’s like the one thing I’m good at.
